sentences.english: A few hundred cyclists have even braved the pot-holed roads for a "Tour de Timor" mountain-bike race.
sentences.chinese: 一場環帝汶自行車賽在凹凸不平的路上拉開帷幕。

sentences.english: China and Chinese Taipei split two gold medals in cycling.
sentences.chinese: 中國和中國臺北隊分割了自行車賽的兩塊金牌。

sentences.english: I told you a bit about my first Ironman bike for a reason…
sentences.chinese: 我回憶第一次大鐵人賽自行車賽段是有原因的。

sentences.english: He has taken part in long-distance cycle races and run several marathons .
sentences.chinese: 他曾參加過遠程自行車賽和好幾個馬拉松賽。

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
(of a student) to work part-time (while continuing one's studies)/(of a delinquent) to be reformed through work and study
